name: swensi-nakonde-terminal
description: Swensi Nakonde - Trade & Transport Logistics Link

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/components && cp index.html manifest.json sw.js metadata.json dist/ && cp *.tsx dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp *.ts dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r components/* dist/components/ 2>/dev/null || true
